jobDescription: Principal Information Assurance Analyst, Pentagon, Arlington, VA Kingfisher Systems, Inc. specializes in providing a full range of Information Technology, Cybersecurity, Intelligence, and support services to the U.S. Government. Kingfisher Systems core competency is technology-enabled services, with a specific focus on national security. Since 2005, Kingfisher has established itself as a recognized and trusted mission partner whose mission is safeguarding sensitive information, operations, and programs for our Federal customers and warfighters. A successful candidate will possess a wide array of experience with Information Assurance /Information Management and Technology to include use and securing of operating systems, network infrastructure, software applications, web servers, and databases.
